title: FigJam brings its app for easy sketching and sharing ideas to the iPad
content:
Figma, the design tool first built for the web, is launching FigJam for the iPad today. In this online whiteboard, teams can ideate and brainstorm together, making it easier for coworkers to sketch the early days of a project in a clean way.

moreâ€¦

The post FigJam brings its app for easy sketching and sharing ideas to the iPad appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: FigJam for the iPad is available. In this online whiteboard, teams can ideate and brainstorm together by sketching the early days of a project.
